title: Unknown Error Has Occurred
body:
Whenever I click "Play" I get the error "An unknown error has occurred". I can navigate everything else in the client just fine but I'm no longer able to click the "Play" button. I get the same error after relogging and I even tried doing a full repair. I'd rather not reinstall the game but I think that's where I'm at now.

EDIT: If I'm invited to someone else's game I can play just fine but I can't start any solo games nor create a lobby to invite others.

EDIT2: After finishing a game that I was invited to the problem goes away and I can make my own game. The problem returns when I relog.

EDIT 3: [Why is there six slots?](https://scontent-ort2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t31.0-8/15874966_1412478572097969_4488618380698576071_o.jpg?oh=0a8935a40052474e29193e1e01913b1b&oe=591084C6)

EDIT 4: I logged in on my friend's computer and everything worked fine. Logged back on mine and everything works fine.

replies.body: That's really weird that this goes away temporarily when you play with others and returns upon login. Maybe try rebooting your computer entirely in case that resolves this entirely. If it doesn't, please let me know.

Had a friend make a lobby for me so I could play an AI game and when he left(making me the leader) something strange happened. Picture linked below.
[Why is there six slots?](https://scontent-ort2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t31.0-8/15874966_1412478572097969_4488618380698576071_o.jpg?oh=0a8935a40052474e29193e1e01913b1b&oe=591084C6)

Damn, that's honestly one of the weirdest things I've seen happy in a lobby with the New Client. If it happens again, I'd recommend posting it in our [**Bug Tracker**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report). Also, hit me up again if you have any other issues you need help with. ^.^

Issue still there. I've also reinstalled League and still have the issue. Next step is reinstalling OS

EDIT: I logged in on my friend's computer and everything worked fine. Logged back on mine and everything works fine. So I guess everything is ok again.
I had this same problem briefly. It was really odd. I didn't have to hard reset anything, just some persistent clicking of the "play" button until the issue somehow resolved itself.
